Package com.tiyb.tev.controller

Class TEVLinkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.controller.TEVLinkController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api")
public class TEVLinkController
extends Object
    REST controller for working with Link items. Heavy lifting performec by the RepoAbstractor class.
    Author:
    tiyb

      • getAllLinksForBlog

        @GetMapping("/posts/{blog}/links")
public List<Link> getAllLinksForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                     String blog)
        GET request for listing all links for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which to retrieve links
        Returns:
        List of all links in the database

      • createLinkForBlog

        @PostMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}/link")
public Link createLinkForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                              String blog,
                              @PathVariable("id")
                              Long postId,
                              @Valid @RequestBody
                              @Valid Link link)
        POST request to submit a Tumblr "link" into the system for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Used for validation purposes
        postId - The ID of the post to which this link refers
        link - The data to be submitted
        Returns:
        The same Link object that was submitted

      • getLinkForBlogById

        @GetMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}/link")
public Link getLinkForBlogById​(@PathVariable("blog")
                               String blog,
                               @PathVariable("id")
                               Long postId)
        GET to return a single link by ID for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - not used
        postId - The Post ID
        Returns:
        The Link details

      • updateLinkForBlog

        @PutMapping("/posts/{blog}/{id}/link")
public Link updateLinkForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                              String blog,
                              @PathVariable("id")
                              Long postId,
                              @RequestBody
                              Link linkDetails)
        PUT to update a Link for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Not used
        postId - The ID of the post to be updated
        linkDetails - The data to be updated
        Returns:
        The same Link object that was submitted

      • deleteAllLinksForBlog

        @DeleteMapping("/posts/{blog}/links")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAllLinksForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                                        String blog)
        DEL to delete all "link" posts in the DB for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which to delete the links
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the response details

                                                                    Long postId)
